segments.text: Good morning , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , could I settle my bill , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . of course . May I have your name and your room number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , Mr . Wang , here is your bill . The total amount is US $ 120 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you wish to settle your account , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By credit card , please . And what kind of credit cards do you honor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We accept Master Card , American Express and Visa .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I'll put it on my Master Card . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Would you sign here , please ? Here's your receipt .
segments.speaker: S1
